article:
Look at the photo. It's my family. The old man and the old woman are my _ . They are at home and help _  with the housework . They think their life is relaxing. This is my father. My father is very  _ . He has many things to do every day. This woman is my mother. She is also my English teacher.
You can also see   _  children in the photo. The two girls are my   _  The girl in a yellow dress is Nancy, and the girl in a yellow dress is Susan. Do you   _  the boy is? It's  _ . My grandparents live in the USA. I live in Beijing with my parents now. My father is a   _ . He works in Beijing Hospital. He often has bread for   _  in the morning. And he likes to be healthy. My mother often   _  some eggs and bread. I have a big family.
